categories: Category:Battles of the Eternal Empire conquest

nodes.text: The Mimban campaign was a prolonged battle that took place on Mimban during the conquest that the Eternal Empire led against the Galactic Republic and the Sith Empire. Jedi Master Gnost-Dural and Jedi Knight Tau Idair participated in the grueling struggle and managed to survive despite the severe losses that their side suffered. The two Jedi regrouped following the campaign and relocated to Ossus and were the sole survivors of the campaign.
